intro: Choose your letters in the row above and submit them to see the score you get.
no_play_on: No, I want to play on
play_again: Play again by pressing the play button. Change the settings by pressing the settings button.
resign_question: Do you really want to resign?
rules: For every letter that is in the hidden word you get one point. If that letter is also at the correct position, you get two points.
